nodes.text: Nodlia, born as LebJau, was a human male miner on Mokivj before becoming a bartender at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.

While LebJau lived on Mokivj, the Separatists took control of the planet. The food rations on the planet were not adequate so the locals sneak out of the encampments and hunted during the nights. LebJau hunted with Grubs and others.

At some point, the group found Padmé Amidala, after her ship had crashed and her escape pod landed in the river. As they had no idea who she was, she convinced them she was simply visiting the planet and that instead of turning her over to the Separatists, they should hold her ransom to her family. They kept Padme in a "boat" that LebJau was crafting out of scrap, although Padme thought it was "rough and amateurish".
When Grand Admiral Thrawn and Darth Vader traveled to Batuu, LebJau, now going by Nodlia, was a bartender at Oga's Cantina. He supplied information to the duo.
LebJau was kind to Padme, even while holding her for ransom. He apologized for not having bedding for her, and, to her surprise, followed through with supplying her with food.
